name: product_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool aliexpress_unofficial.
Tool description: DEPRECATED. Will deleted after 2023-03-01
API description: Fetches product details from the AliExpress API using the provided product ID and optional parameters.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to fetch details for.

locale.description: The locale to be used for the request (e.g., 'en_US').
